packageName: Google Calendar, Task, Reminder, and Gmail Search and Gmail Notification Device
author: ritchierich
releaseNotes:
v4.4.0: Fixed bug to address situation when hub and target Google Calendar are set to different time zones.
- Added 'Debug authentication' setting to the parent GCal Search app that controls debug logging of the authentication to the Google APIs since this can contain sensitive information if shared. This defaults to false
- Child GCal Search Trigger now passes its app label to the parent GCal Search app so you can distinguish debug logging if multiple search triggers are scheduled at the same time
- If a GCal Search Trigger has a child switch, the Last Refreshed text at the very top will be a clickable link so you can quickly navigate to that child device
- A new 'Use offset for start and end timestamps' preference was added to the GCal Switch driver that will control whether the eventStartTime and eventEndTime attributes use the offset timestamps versus the actual event timestamps
v4.3.0: Added ability to parse text from Google items and update Hub variables with those values
v4.2.0: Fixed issue with sending files via Gmail notification
v4.1.0: Fixed NullPointerException error in parent GCal Search app, Added the ability to include emoji's within Gmail notification email subjects, Added the ability to specify a from Display Name within Gmail notification messages
v4.0.0: Re-release of the Gmail Search and Notification Device with new version number.
- Added ability to dynamically set the recipient and subject of a Gmail notification within the notification message
- Added the ability to specify a file within the Gmail notification message to be included in the email as an attachment
- When setting up new Gmail Search triggers, the search string is no longer required

Prior Release notes can be found in this post on the community: https://community.hubitat.com/t/release-google-calendar-task-reminder-and-gmail-search-and-gmail-notification-device/71397/2
